Card.Name: Birds of Paradise
Card.RulesText: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Ivory Tower
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

Card.Name: Kird Ape
Card.RulesText: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

Card.Name: Zuran Orb
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.

Card.Name: Tracker
Card.RulesText: {G}{G}, {T}: Tracker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tracker.

Card.Name: Swords to Plowshares
Card.RulesText: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

Card.Name: Juggernaut
Card.RulesText: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

Card.Name: Lightning Bolt
Card.RulesText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Erhnam Djinn
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

Card.Name: Spirit Link
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

Card.Name: Dragon Whelp
Card.RulesText: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

Card.Name: Balance
Card.RulesText: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

Card.Name: Armageddon
Card.RulesText: Destroy all lands.

Card.Name: Serra Angel
Card.RulesText: Flying, vigilance

Card.Name: Disenchant
Card.RulesText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Card.Name: Shivan Dragon
Card.RulesText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Pyroclasm
Card.RulesText: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

Card.Name: Disintegrate
Card.RulesText: Disintegrate deals X damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

Card.Name: Fireball
Card.RulesText: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

Card.Name: Wrath of God
Card.RulesText: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

Card.Name: Savannah
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

Card.Name: Plateau
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)

Card.Name: Taiga
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

Card.Name: Undiscovered Paradise
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add one mana of any color. During your next untap step, as you untap your permanents, return Undiscovered Paradise to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Arid Mesa
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Gemstone Mine
Card.RulesText: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it. {T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.
